    const overlayColor = '#FFFFFF';
    const createOverlay = () => {
        const n = document.createElement('div');
        (n.id = 'eppo-loading-overlay'),
        (n.style.position = 'fixed'),
        (n.style.top = '0'),
        (n.style.left = '0'),
        (n.style.width = '100%'),
        (n.style.height = '100%'),
        (n.style.backgroundColor = overlayColor),
        (n.style.zIndex = ('2147483647')),
        (n.style.pointerEvents = 'none'),
        document.body.appendChild(n);
    }
    if(window && !window.EppoVisualEditor?.hideOverlay) { // this evaluates if the object does not exist or if the hideOverlay 
      createOverlay();
    }
    // If the script is not loaded within 2 seconds, remove the overlay
    // It's going slower than usual, we need to see why
    setTimeout(() => {
        document.getElementById('eppo-loading-overlay')?.remove();
    }, 2000);

are seeking a highly motivated and experienced Activations Director to join our Global Customer Success team. The ideal candidate will be a strategic thinker, passionate about creating seamless, efficient, and value-driven onboarding experiences that accelerate time-to-value, drive product adoption, and lay the foundation for long-term customer success.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;Reporting to the VP of Global Customer Success, you will work closely with cross-functional teams including Sales, Product, and Marketing to refine our customer activation process and ensure a world-class post-sale experience.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;Key Responsibilities:\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;Strategic Impact \u0026amp;amp; Execution:\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt; You will be responsible for defining and executing the global strategy for customer onboarding and initial product use. A key part of this is identifying and creating new value streams, such as developing upsell opportunities like custom development or advanced training, by deeply understanding customer needs and translating those needs into actionable service offerings.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;Process Management:\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt; You will standardize the onboarding methodology to ensure a consistent, high-quality experience for all customers, with a special focus on enterprise clients. Your primary goal is to significantly reduce the time it takes for new customers to get value from the product, known as time-to-value (TTV).\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;Cross-Functional Collaboration:\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt; This role is the central point of contact for activation, bridging communication between the Customer Success, Sales, and Product teams. journey.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;Data-Driven Improvement:\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt; You will establish and track key performance indicators (KPIs) to measure at least one general-purpose programming language (C/C++, Go, Java, Ruby, PHP, Python, etc.)\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Deep understanding of the architectural patterns of deployments\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Strong knowledge of container orchestration, Linux system internals, networking, and secure computing.\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Significant experience with major cloud providers (Google Cloud, AWS)\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Significant experience with deploying and administration of MySQL\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Experience with Infrastructure as Code platforms such as Terraform\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Experience with observability systems, such as Datadog, Grafana, Prometheus, VictoriaMetrics, OpenCensus, and Graphite\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;Bonus points (nice skills to have, but not needed):\u0026lt;/strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Knowledge of ArgoCD, Atlantis, Varnish, Memcached, and/or Chef\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;li\u0026gt;Experience with generalized build systems (make, bazel, please, etc.) or language-specific build systems (SWC, Turborepo, etc.).\u0026lt;/li\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;/ul\u0026gt;\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;\u0026lt;strong\u0026gt;\u0026lt;em\u0026gt;Base Salary
